Instruction: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) and line baking sheets with parchment paper.
Add the flour, baking powder, and salt to the mixture and mix until just combined.

Place the batter into a cookie press fitted with a 1/4 inch star-shaped tip, and pipe out 6-inch strips of batter. Cut the strips into 2-inch pieces, or shape them into rings or letters, and arrange them on the lined baking sheets.
Bake in the preheated oven until the cookies are crunchy and golden brown, about 6 to 8 minutes. Let the cookies cool.
Sift 1/2 cup of confectioners' sugar through a fine mesh sieve to lightly coat the cookies before serving.
